translation.en: Okay. All right, one, two, three...
Guys! One...
Hold on. Guys, freeze!
ALVIN: Hey, Dave. Where's Alvin?

translation.en: Where have you been? Where have I been?

translation.en: Trying to board the ship.
Already done that. Also, checked out our room,

translation.en: dibbed the side of the bed closest to the window,

Alvin, you're too young for parasailing.

translation.en: Don't worry, family vacations are all about fun.

translation.en: But first we're gonna need to set some rules.
Let's start with you can't call dibs on a bed until everyone's in the room.
That's right. ELEANOR: Good rule.
That's a good one, Simon. All right, so that's our first rule.

translation.en: Should we go over the rest of them?

translation.en: Dave, come on. "Rules" is my middle name.

♪ No rocket ships to send me into outer space
♪ And my fingers are bejeweled With diamonds and gold

♪ Yeah, trouble now
♪ I'm trouble, y'all I got trouble in my town

translation.en: ♪ I'm trouble
Alvin! Hey, Dave.
DAVE: Whoa. Ahhh! Ahhh! Ow! ALVIN: Ha ha! Whoo!
This is your captain speaking.
All kids are now allowed to play
on the adults-only Serenity Deck.

translation.en: ♪ I'm trouble
♪ Yeah, trouble now
♪ I'm trouble, y'all I got trouble in my town

translation.en: ♪ You think you're right, but you were wrong

translation.en: ♪ You tried to take me, baby, but you knew all along

translation.en: ♪ I'm not a fool now, so you better run and hide

translation.en: Alvin!
(RAPPING) ♪ Yo! I'm the T to the R to the O-U-bull
♪ Rock it non-stop till the mic gets dull
♪ Take what I want when I want, no holding back
♪ When I kick a flow I'm all up on the track
♪ A to the L to the V-I-N
♪ When I'm in town, me and all of my friends
♪ Gonna come through like a hurricane
♪ Tearing down everything in my way ♪

translation.en: Alvin!
We talked about setting rules, Alvin.
I'm sorry. I didn't know the agreement meant no fun.
translation.ja: ルールって楽しんじゃいけないの？

translation.en: You're allowed to have fun. When are you going to stop acting like a child?

translation.en: When are you going to stop treating me like a child?
I'll stop treating you like a child when you start acting like a grown-up!

translation.en: I'll start acting like a grown-up when you start...

SIMON: Sorry, Dave. ALVIN: Lame!
I need to get ready for dinner with the captain.
(GASPS) We're having dinner with the captain?
No, I am. You're staying here. I have to go apologize for everything Alvin did.

translation.en: This is so not fair. Not to us, not to Dave, and certainly not to the captain,

translation.en: who I'm sure was really looking forward to dining with me.
translation.ja: 私と食事したかったのに

translation.en: Why don't I go speak with Dave? See if I can smooth things over.
translation.ja: 僕が丸く収まるようよく話してみる

translation.en: SIMON: Knock-knock.
What is it, Simon?

translation.en: Well, I would never say this to Alvin.
translation.ja: アルビンには内緒だよ

translation.en: Goodness knows he can be totally irresponsible,

translation.en: but I actually have a suggestion.
You have a suggestion for me?
He's been driving me crazy a lot longer than he's been driving you crazy.

translation.en: All right. So what is it?
Imagine Alvin is a spirited racehorse.
translation.ja: アルビンは元気な競走馬だ

translation.en: That's your advice?
No. I'm not done yet, Dave.
All right, so Alvin is a racehorse...
And you, Dave, are his incredibly helpful jockey

translation.en: who's there to guide him down the racetrack of life.
translation.ja: 人生のコースの案内役だ

translation.en: But if you hold the reins too tight, that racehorse is going to fight and buck,
translation.ja: でも手綱をしめすぎたら馬は大暴れ

translation.en: which is no fun for anyone.
But if you loosen the reins just a little...
He'll fly right off the track and crash into the fence.

translation.en: I know you want to protect Alvin,
but, Dave, sometimes kids will rise to the occasion

translation.en: if you just show them a little trust.
translation.ja: 子供は信頼されるとピンチに強くなる

translation.ja: 食事はルームサービス就寝は９時だ

translation.en: Dave, question.
If we're going to be held captive in this room...
Because of Alvin!
Can we at least watch a movie?
All right, let's see what's on.
You know what, why don't you guys pick a movie? You're old enough to make your own decision.
translation.ja: もう自分で決められるだろ

translation.en: For real, Dave?
Absolutely.
Ooh! Dave looks so elegant.
Have fun!
Wait, Dave, before you go, I made something for you.

translation.en: Wow, it's really...
It's soft so you can sleep in it

translation.en: and I made it with all the colors, so it will go with everything!

translation.en: Great. I'll put it on after dinner.
You could put it on now, so everyone at the captain's table could see it.

translation.en: ALVIN: (LAUGHING) Nice.
A real chick magnet.
All right, guys, have fun.
But not too much fun, because I'm still very upset.

And, hello, ladies!

Where are you going?

"We're old enough to make our own decisions."
He meant we were old enough to choose a film!
Well, we're clearly not. Check out what Theodore just picked.

translation.en: What's wrong with this movie?
It's for babies!
Which is probably why Dave treats us like babies.

translation.en: Munk up, Theodore.

translation.en: There. That's more like it.
Alvin, please!
I say we go to Salsa Night!

Oh, I know!
Alvin!
And we have a winner.

translation.en: Ellie, I love these dresses!
You're so crafty.
Thanks. It's what I do.

Ew! What are you?
(LAUGHS) We are the Chipettes.
Hi, I'm Eleanor!
My sister was just trying to apologize.

translation.en: Or her busted, tired little dance moves?

translation.en: Oh, no, you didn't!
Oh, yes, she did!
You better get those Lee Press-Ons out of my face unless you want to meet my claws.

translation.en: And, yeah, baby, they're real.

translation.en: Hit it! Do you wanna go?
DAVE: Captain, I'm really sorry about what happened.
Alvin, he's a kid. He's just trying to have some fun.

translation.en: There's nothing wrong with fun.
Our pelican makes sure that everybody on the ship has fun.

translation.en: However, my number one priority is the passengers' safety.

translation.en: So I simply cannot have Alvin put himself, or anyone else, at risk again.

translation.en: Believe me, I understand.
If Alvin breaks any more of our rules, there will be consequences.

Hot! WAITER: Sorry.
Hot!
Unbelievable. Gravy pants.

You bet I have a problem with you.
Why? As if you didn't know.
I don't know.
Ian? What are you doing here?

This is your job?

translation.en: Twice.
Look, Ian, I'm sorry you lost your job and your dignity.

Why don't we just start with this vacation?

Theodore?
Please don't eat my brain!

Simon?
Girls?
(GASPS) I'll be right back!

ALVIN: You can follow me on Critter!
Alvin! Alvin!
Simon?
I wasn't betting. Honest.
Your winnings, sir.
Oh, busted!
I didn't sneak out. I mean, I did. But only to stop Alvin.

Captain.
ALVIN: What's he going to do, make us walk the plank?
(GASPS) There's a plank?

Absolutely.

translation.en: But I have to stay put. Or do I?

translation.en: But he does have a point, Dave.
There's got to be times when you trust us to take matters into our own hands.

translation.en: No. Shuffleboard.
By my calculations,
it appears to be 10% shuffle, 90% bored.

translation.en: (GIGGLES) That's funny!

translation.en: Oh, Thanks. You really think so?

translation.en: You know, Dave, I think I'd prefer the plank.

translation.en: Sorry, Alvin, but this is what you get to do.
And I get to do something I haven't done in a long time.

translation.en: Absolutely nothing.
ALVIN: Brittany approaches her puck,
translation.ja: ブリタニーがスタンスをとり⸺

translation.en: adjusts her stance, looks over at me, quite annoyed,
translation.ja: ブリタニーがスタンスをとり⸺ オレをにらみつけて⸺

translation.en: wonders to herself if I'm ever going to shut my mouth,
translation.ja: “うるさいから黙れ”と思いながら⸺

translation.en: realizes I'm not, and makes her move.

translation.en: Oh, it's short! (LAUGHING)
A costly error, ladies and gentlemen,
that's going to haunt her the rest of her career.

translation.en: You can make all the jokes you want, Alvin, but not even you can make this interesting.

translation.en: Oh, really? Well, care to make it interesting that I can make this interesting?

translation.en: Alvin, what are you up to? Need I remind you Dave is watching us.
translation.ja: 何を企んでる？デイブが見張ってるぞ 彼は１秒も休んでないのだからクタクタ

translation.en: Simon, the poor guy hasn't had a moment's peace since he met us. He's exhausted.
translation.ja: 彼は１秒も休んでないのだからクタクタ

translation.en: Check this out. In three, two, one.
Lights out.
Nap time! (SNORING)
Time to turn punishment into funishment.
translation.ja: 罰ゲームはやめて楽しいゲームを

translation.en: (LAUGHING) You get it?
I took the "pun" in punishment, and turned it into "fun,"
translation.ja: “罰”を“楽しい”にして⸺ 後ろにゲームをつけたの

translation.en: but kept the "ishment." It's word play!
translation.ja: 後ろにゲームをつけたの 言葉遊び

translation.en: ALVIN: Hey, kid!
Wanna make a trade? That's a nice-looking kite.
translation.ja: そのカイトと交換しない？

translation.en: I can see Russia from here!
Come on, Simon, grab on.
Forget it. All I ever do is try to save him and it only gets me in trouble!

translation.en: This won't end well.
Simon, do something!

translation.en: Oh, seriously?
Simon, help!
Alvin's gotten himself in a bind. Looks like it's Simon saving him again!
translation.ja: また あいつのピンチを僕が救ってる

translation.en: (LAUGHS) Thanks, bro.
Thank you! Huh?
♪ Rock-a-bye, Davey, on the lounge chair
translation.ja: お休みデイビー　　ラウンジチェアで

translation.en: ♪ If you awake, you'll pull out your hair ♪
translation.ja: お目々が覚めたら　　　　もうカンカン

translation.en: ALL: Dave!
THEODORE: Help us!
DAVE: Guys! Guys!
CHIPMUNKS: Dave! Help us!
You want to go hang gliding, sign up at the Excursion Desk like everyone else.
translation.ja: 空を飛ぶなら先に申し込んで

translation.en: Ian, you don't understand!
Oh, I think I do. Dave Seville is so special that the rules don't apply to him.
translation.ja: 自分はＶＩＰだからルールは無視ってか

translation.en: Let go!
No, you let go.
IAN: Hey! Come on! Great!
IAN: I need my pelican head!
You idiot!
Great. Way to go, Seville.
Me?
Yeah, you!
Save your breath, Dave. They'll come back for me.
translation.ja: 叫ぶな　きっと戻ってくる

translation.en: In retrospect, this was a bad idea.
translation.ja: 空を飛ぶなんてやっぱ無謀だった

translation.en: We're losing altitude!
I don't think I can make it much longer.
translation.ja: ボクは もうおしまいだ

translation.en: I'm so hungry. Just one bite.
translation.ja: お腹ペコペコだから一口

translation.en: No.
A nibble? No nibbles.
translation.ja: ひとかじり それもダメ

translation.en: Maybe I can just lick the glaze?
The glaze is what's keeping you alive, Theodore!
Its high fat content is creating a waterproof barrier.
translation.ja: 脂肪分が防水になってる

translation.en: I'm gonna starve to death!
Actually, there are many other things that will kill you before starvation.

translation.en: Dehydration, sunstroke...
(GASPS) An island.
No, an island would probably be helpful.
translation.ja: 島があれば助かるかも

translation.en: So if you see one, you should definitely say something.
translation.ja: 見つけたら声をかけて

translation.en: Uh, Jeanette?
(LAUGHING) We're alive! We're alive!
translation.ja: やった！　生きてるぞ！

translation.en: Good. Because now
I'm going to kill you!
Guys, guys, guys! Nobody is killing anyone, okay?
translation.ja: 待って　殺すのはダメだ

translation.en: No matter how much he deserves it.
Thank you, Si. Though I could have done without the passive aggression.

translation.en: (CLEARS THROAT) Look, we've got nothing to worry about.

translation.en: Dave knows we're gone by now. He probably has the whole coast guard looking for us.

translation.en: Meantime, why don't we all just relax and have some donut?

translation.en: Did you guys want some?
Theodore! Alvin! Simon!

translation.en: Can't you kick any faster?
It's been two hours, Dave.
Thanks to biannual Pilates classes, I have legs that won't quit, but they do slow down.

They don't come off. It's one piece.
No quality mascot suit has removable feet.
translation.ja: 着ぐるみは全部そうだ

translation.en: Take the suit off, then.
I can't.
Why not?
I'm not wearing anything underneath.
Look!
No, no, it's okay, I believe you.

translation.en: No, look!

What are you doing?

Hold.
Fire!

Now, wasn't that a pleasant ride?
Good thing we don't wear pants.
Okay, you guys, come on, come over.
Are you sure it's safe?
Of course it's safe.
I do this thing every day.
Jeanette! THEODORE: Jeanette!
Hold on, Jeanette.
(SCREAMS) Viens, ma chere.
No, no. Look into my eyes.
translation.ja: ダメだ　僕の目を見ろ

translation.en: You have nothing to fear.
Yes, yes. Very good.
Voila! You are safe. Bravo!
You're so brave. You made it! Aw!
ELEANOR: Pretty.
Double rainbow. What does it mean?
translation.ja: “ダブル･レインボー”どういう意味？

translation.en: Alive they're superstars, sure. But dead? They're legends.
translation.ja: スーパースターも死ねば伝説だ

translation.en: I'm talking about tribute albums, pay-per-view funerals.
translation.ja: 追悼アルバムに葬式に…

translation.en: Wait a second. You actually think I'm in this for the money?
translation.ja: マネジャーになったのは金のためだと？

translation.en: Well, if you're doing it to pick up chicks, you're doing a lousy job.
translation.ja: 女を引っかけるためなら失敗だな

translation.en: I'm doing this because I love them, okay?
Look, if you wanna spend the rest of your life running around after a bunch of spoiled brats, be my guest.
translation.ja: ガキに振り回されたいなら好きにすればいい

translation.en: They're not brats.
Really? Even Alvin?
You never even bothered to get to know them, Ian.
I mean, sure, Alvin can be kind of a handful, but he means well.
translation.ja: 確かにアルビンはイタズラするけど悪気はない

translation.en: He's sometimes just a little irresponsible, that's all.
translation.ja: ちょっと…調子に乗りすぎるだけだ

translation.en: But, come on, Simon?
He's probably the most level-headed kid I know.
If anything, he's a little too uptight.
And then there's little Theodore.
Dave, I barely cared about what you had to say about the first two.
translation.ja: デイブ 最初の２匹もどうでもいいが⸺

translation.en: I can't imagine the big-boned one is gonna be any more interesting.
translation.ja: ポッチャリなんてよけい興味がない

translation.en: Forget it, let's just keep going.
translation.ja: もういい　先を急ごう

translation.en: Up, poisson, up!
Oh, no. This is terrible.
translation.ja: 変ね　何かあったのよ

translation.en: Shouldn't he have come up by now?
Uh-oh. Simone! Where are you?
translation.ja: シモーン　どこにいるの？

translation.en: Zoe, you've gotta do something.
translation.ja: ゾーイ　何とかして

translation.en: All right.
Callaway, I need you to go in there and find Simone.
translation.ja: キャロウェイシモーンを捜して

translation.en: I know you can do it, little buddy.
You're kidding, right?
If Callaway can't find him, nobody can. (EXCLAIMS IN PAIN)
(GASPS) Simone!
Told you.
I'm sorry if I caused you any worry, mademoiselle.
translation.ja: 心配をかけてすまない

translation.en: But I have something for you. Maybe this will be a way to make it up.
translation.ja: 君に お土産だ これで許してくれるかな

translation.en: Oh! It's beautiful!
Where did you find it?
Yeah, it is beautiful. Where did you find it?
translation.ja: 本当にキレイどこで見つけたの？

translation.en: In a cave behind the waterfall.
I thought it would look nice on you. But now I realize even the most precious gem cannot compare to your beauty.
translation.ja: だけど どんな宝石も君の美しさにはかなわない

translation.en: BOTH: Aw!
Yeah. Were there any other jewels or gems or diamonds
translation.ja: それで⸺ 他に宝石とかダイヤとかなかった？

translation.en: or anything else in there?
translation.ja: 他に宝石とかダイヤとかなかった？

translation.en: By the time I found the gold, I had already been gone from my Jeanette far too long.
translation.ja: 黄金は見つけたんだが早く彼女に会いたくて

translation.en: What?
You guys, they found it. They found it!
translation.ja: みんな　リスが見つけた

translation.en: And the best part is, they don't even know what they found. They think that it's just one bracelet.
translation.ja: 何も知らずに腕輪だけ持ってきて

translation.en: Which means that the rest of the treasure is mine.
translation.ja: つまり残りは私のもの

translation.en: All mine! (LAUGHING MANIACALLY)
(GRUNTING) What the...
Whoa! What are you?
Yeah, you're one of those honey badgers.
You just take what you want.
Drop it. Drop it!
You mess with me, ese, I'll go loco on you.
translation.ja: おちょくるとぶちのめすぞ

translation.en: Give it back!
You can sting like a bee or strike like a cobra, but this honey munk don't care!
translation.ja: ハチやコブラをマネてもオレには勝てないぞ

translation.en: Okay, Brit, I'm all done.
translation.ja: ブリタニー　終わったよ

translation.en: If you want, I can help you get started...
translation.ja: よかったら そっちを…

translation.en: This tree house is awesome.
translation.ja: このツリーハウス すごいね

translation.en: Maybe you are kind of the smart one.
translation.ja: 君は お利口キャラだよ

translation.en: Thank you, Alvin. And yours is...
translation.ja: ありがとう　あなたのは…

translation.en: you did your best.
Anyhoo, no reason we can't be comfortable and stylish while we wait for Dave to show up, right?
translation.ja: デイブが来るまででもオシャレに暮らさないと

translation.en: Brit, I... I think I know why Dave hasn't come.
translation.ja: なぜデイブが来ないのかその理由を知ってる

translation.en: You do? Why?
'Cause he's not even looking.
translation.ja: オレたちを捜してないから

translation.en: Alvin, why wouldn't he be looking for us?
translation.ja: なぜ私たちを捜してないの？

translation.en: Because I drive him crazy.
You know, the way Simon's been driving me crazy?
translation.ja: サイモンがやったように⸺

translation.en: I mean, that's what I've been doing to Dave. For years.
translation.ja: オレもデイブを何年も振り回してた

translation.en: No wonder he hates me.
Oh! Don't worry, Alvin. I'm sure Dave will come.
translation.ja: 大丈夫よ　アルビンデイブは必ず来るわ

translation.en: I mean, he certainly loves Simon and Theodore.
translation.ja: サイモンとセオドアは好きだもの

translation.en: Simon? Is Dave ever gonna find us?
translation.ja: サイモンデイブは来てくれる？

translation.en: Simon? I mean, Simone?
translation.ja: サイモン…じゃなくてシモーン

translation.en: I'm so sorry, were you speaking to moi?
Yes! About Dave!
translation.ja: うん　デイブのこと

translation.en: Are we ever going to find him?
translation.ja: デイブに会えると思う？

translation.en: I see you are sad, mon ami.
And I hate to see you sad.
translation.ja: 俺は悲しい顔を見たくない

translation.en: I will help you find your friend Dave.
translation.ja: 一緒にデイブを捜してやる

translation.en: You really think you can find him?
I know I can!
And then I will find this Simon you keep speaking of!
translation.ja: “サイモン”も見つけてやろう

translation.en: As Dave and I have never met, I will need you to describe him for me.
translation.ja: デイブを知らないから特徴を教えてくれ

translation.en: Well, he's very kind and a good storyteller.
translation.ja: とても優しくてお話するのがうまいんだ

translation.en: Mmm-hmm. Very helpful.
translation.ja: とても優しくてお話するのがうまいんだ なるほど

translation.en: Oh! And he's about this tall.
translation.ja: それと身長はこれぐらい

translation.en: Is he by any chance a big, flightless bird?

translation.en: I don't think so.
Then these footprints must not be his.
translation.ja: じゃ この足跡は違うな

translation.en: (GASPS) Jungle Monster!
translation.ja: ジャングル･モンスターだ

translation.en: Do you hear that?
Yeah, it's my stomach grumbling.
No, no, maybe it's a helicopter! Listen!
translation.ja: 違うよ　ヘリの音だ

translation.en: Face it, Dave, no one is coming to rescue us, okay?

translation.en: And my stomach noises are gonna get louder and louder and louder
translation.ja: そして腹の虫は大合唱して⸺

translation.en: until one day they just stop.
translation.ja: やがてピタッと止まる

translation.en: Because I will have eaten you.
translation.ja: なぜなら お前を食うから

translation.en: Maybe you're right. Maybe no one's coming.
translation.ja: そうだな 助けは来ないしみんなもダメかも

translation.en: Maybe the chipmunks aren't here at all. Maybe they're gone.
translation.ja: 助けは来ないしみんなもダメかも

translation.en: I really messed up.
Dave, it kills me to say this, kills me, but...

translation.en: Look, man,
you're really good with those kids, really good.
translation.ja: 君は奴らの面倒をよくみたよ

translation.en: They love you.
And I should know because I was really bad with those kids and they hate me.
translation.ja: 俺はイジメたから嫌われたけど

translation.en: But, look, you should know that whatever happens,
you did nothing wrong. Nothing.
Thanks, Ian.
Come here.
Ian?
Ian?
Ian!
Mon dieu!
The Jungle Monster's real! And it's angry!
translation.ja: ジャングル･モンスターが怒ってる

translation.en: Or hungry. Allons-y!
translation.ja: 腹ペコなのかもアロンジー！

translation.en: That means let's go. Oh.
Great, a volcano.
Of course! That's why the water was so hot!
translation.ja: だから お湯が熱いのね

translation.en: It's being heated by the underground magma chamber!
translation.ja: 地中のマグマが温めたのよ

translation.en: How do you know that?
I have no idea!
The place where I get my nails done always has the Science Channel on. Maybe I accidentally paid attention.
translation.ja: ネイルサロンで見た科学番組の受け売りよ

translation.en: Hey, guys, anyone up for a quick hike?
translation.ja: みんな 滝までハイキングしない？

translation.en: Like, I don't know, maybe to the waterfall or whatever?
translation.ja: 滝までハイキングしない？

translation.en: Not now, Zoe! The whole island is going to explode! What?
translation.ja: ダメだってこの島 爆発するぞ

translation.en: Guys, we've got to get off this island. We have to build a raft, now.
translation.ja: 今すぐ脱出しようイカダを作るんだ

translation.en: "Right now" like, right now?
Or "right now" like, after a hike to the waterfall now?
translation.ja: それとも滝に行ってから？

translation.en: (GRUNTS) I've been hit!
By Dave's necklace?
Tell Jeanette I will watch over her with angel wings.
translation.ja: ジャネット天使になって見守るよ

translation.en: Dave?
Theodore!
SIMONE: Dave? Ha ha!
Told you we'd find him!
Simon!
It is Simone, but I am often confused for this Simon fellow.
translation.ja: 俺はシモーンだよく間違えられるけど

translation.en: Perhaps we look alike?
Simone?
Ian!
Hey, you found the chubby one.
DAVE: Don't worry, Theodore.
Nothing's gonna happen to you. Is it?
(WHIMPERS) What was that?
That's an active volcano.
Okay, Brittany and I will build the deck.

translation.en: Eleanor, you need to start braiding ropes.
Jeanette, find as many coconuts and mangoes as you can.
translation.ja: ジャネットはココナツとマンゴーを

translation.en: Who knows how long we'll be out there.
What can I do to help?
Dave! Dave!
ELEANOR: Dave!
Hey.
We missed you so much.
I knew you would find us.
Eleanor! What happened?
You know, just a zip-line accident.
translation.ja: 滑空で事故っちゃって

translation.en: A what? I'm fine.
translation.ja: 滑空？ もう平気よ説明すると痛むけど

translation.en: It only hurts when I try to explain it.
translation.ja: もう平気よ説明すると痛むけど

translation.en: Okay, you know what, never mind. The important thing is you guys are safe.
translation.ja: とにかくみんな無事でよかった

translation.en: Alvin?
Everything's gonna be okay.
Hey, what is it?
I thought you'd never find us. That you weren't even looking.
translation.ja: 来ないと思ってた捜してくれないって

translation.en: Why wouldn't I look for you?
translation.ja: なぜ そんなことを？

translation.en: Because I'm such a pain in the...
Alvin.
I know, you don't think I'm a pain.
No, you're a pain. But I'd come, no matter what.
translation.ja: そう思ってるけど助けに来るよ

translation.en: SIMONE: Arc de Triomphe, mayonnaise, Napoleon.
translation.ja: 〈凱旋門　マヨネーズ　ナポレオン〉

translation.en: I get it, Frenchie, you come from a rich history.

translation.en: Well, guess what, we're all gonna be history if we don't get out of here.
translation.ja: 早く逃げないと俺たちが歴史に

translation.en: CHIPETTES: (GASPING) Uncle Ian!
What's he doing here?
It's kind of a long story.
Don't worry, he's cool.
Yes, for a pelican man.
Oh, yeah, nothing cooler than a grown man in a pelican suit.
translation.ja: 着ぐるみ着てたら悪さはできないよ

translation.en: So, Dave, how are we gonna get out of here?
I don't know, Alvin, I think you've got this under control.
translation.ja: 分からないよ　君に任せる

translation.en: Theodore, you and Eleanor are on rope duty.
translation.ja: セオドアとエレノアはロープ

translation.en: Dave and Ian, we need oars.
translation.ja: デイブとイアンはオール

translation.en: Simone, you and Jeanette are in charge of food.
translation.ja: シモーンとジャネットは食料集め

translation.en: And, Zoe...
No, I know, I know. I'm gonna go and I'm gonna pack up my balls!
translation.ja: 分かってるボールたちを集めるから

translation.en: Who's that?
Another long story.
Yeah! Good work, guys! Let's get off this island.
translation.ja: よし　いいぞ イカダを作って島を脱出しよう

translation.en: This raft won't build itself.
translation.ja: イカダを作って島を脱出しよう

translation.en: Heave!
It's incredible, you guys.
translation.ja: みんな よくやった

translation.en: Very impressive.
Just seeing everyone come together to build it... (VOLCANO RUMBLING) I just want to say...
translation.ja: みんなで頑張ってるのを見てて…

translation.en: It can wait.
Wait, where are Jeanette and Simone?
translation.ja: ジャネットとシモーンはどこ？

translation.en: (EXHALING) I hope this is going to be enough.
Who can say?
translation.ja: 聞こえた？ どうだろう

translation.en: When I am with you, all I can hear is the beating of my own heart.
translation.ja: 聞こえるのはこの胸のときめきだけ

translation.en: Oh, Simone!
Somebody! Help!
Jeanette?
ALVIN: Guys! Guys! Over here! Come quick, hurry!
translation.ja: みんな　こっちだ 早く来て

translation.en: Simone, are you okay?
Simone!
translation.ja: シモーン　大丈夫？ シモーン！

translation.en: Why are you calling me Simone?
translation.ja: なぜシモーンって呼ぶの？

translation.en: Simon?
translation.ja: なぜシモーンって呼ぶの？ サイモン

translation.en: Yeah.
(LAUGHS) You're back! It finally wore off!
translation.ja: 戻ったぞ　毒が消えた

translation.en: What wore off?
translation.ja: 毒？ 毒グモに咬まれて頭がゴチャッと

translation.en: You were bitten by a spider. It, like, messed up your brain.
translation.ja: 毒グモに咬まれて頭がゴチャッと

translation.en: Ah. Is that why I think I see Dave and a half-Ian, half-bird?
translation.ja: それでデイブとイアン鳥の幻覚を見てるのかな

translation.en: No, it's really me. And really Ian.
translation.ja: 僕もイアンも本物だよ

translation.en: 'Sup?
Simon, where's Jeanette? She was out here with you.
translation.ja: ジャネットは？一緒にいたろ

translation.en: Jeanette? I don't know...
I do. It's Zoe. She took her.
translation.ja: ゾーイが連れてったわ

translation.en: Simon, I need to know where you found that gold bracelet.
translation.ja: サイモンどこで黄金の腕輪を？

translation.en: What gold bracelet?
The one you gave to Jeanette.
What? When did I give Jeanette a bracelet?
translation.ja: いつ僕がジャネットに？

translation.en: On your date.
(GASPS) Jeanette and I are dating?
Okay, he's useless.
Theodore, Eleanor, you're gonna have to lead the way.
translation.ja: セオドア　エレノア道案内して

translation.en: I don't remember exactly how to get there.
translation.ja: 道なんか覚えてないよ

translation.en: I do!
Which way, Eleanor?
Make a left. No, right. No, left!
translation.ja: 左よ　違う右　違う左

translation.en: I thought you said you knew where you were going.
I do! Sometimes I just forget my left from my right.
translation.ja: そうよ　でも左右を間違えるの

translation.en: That way!
Okay, we just have to cross here.
translation.ja: そうよ　この橋を渡るの

translation.en: (GASPS) Are you kidding me? Guys, I can't do that.
translation.ja: 冗談だろ　僕は渡れない

translation.en: But, Simon, you already did.
translation.ja: でもサイモン前に渡ってるよ

translation.en: No, I didn't. That was Simone, that was not me.
translation.ja: あれはシモーンで僕じゃない

translation.en: But Simone is you. He's in there somewhere.
translation.ja: あなたの中にシモーンがいるの

translation.en: You just have to find him, tout de suite.
translation.ja: だからシモーンを探して

translation.en: Because Jeanette needs you, Simon.
translation.ja: ジャネットが待ってる

translation.en: No, I'm sorry, I just can't do it.
translation.ja: 無理だ　僕にはできないよ

translation.en: All right, Ian, get everyone to the raft.
If the volcano blows before I make it out of here, you have to promise me you'll...
translation.ja: 爆発したら僕がいなくても…

translation.en: Leave without you. Got it.
Dave.
I'm coming with you.
Absolutely not, it's too dangerous.
translation.ja: ダメだ　危険すぎる

translation.en: Remember I said someday I may need to disobey you?
translation.ja: いつか逆らう日がくるって

translation.en: Sorry, Dave, but I gotta disobey you.
translation.ja: ごめん　今がその時だ

translation.en: Let's go.
You're not coming up until you have every last bit of that treasure.
translation.ja: お宝を全部運び出すまで出さないからね

translation.en: But the volcano is about to explode!
translation.ja: でも もうすぐ火山が爆発する

translation.en: Well, then I guess you better hurry, huh?
Run, go, go. In you go.
translation.ja: 行って　どんどん行って

translation.en: Get down there. That's right.
translation.ja: 早く降りな！ そうよ　止まらないで

translation.en: Keep going!
translation.ja: そうよ　止まらないで

translation.en: ♪ S.O.S.
♪ Please someone help me
translation.ja: ＳＯＳ　お願い 誰か助けて

translation.en: ♪ It's not healthy for me to feel this
translation.ja: マトモじゃないわ こんな恐怖

translation.en: ♪ Y.O.U. are
♪ Making it hard
♪ I can't help it See, it don't feel right
translation.ja: この間違いを　　どうにかして

translation.en: Keep moving!
♪ This time, please
♪ Someone come and rescue me ♪
Okay! Pull me up. I can't hold any more.
translation.ja: もう引っ張ってこれ以上は持てない

translation.en: If you can still talk, it means you haven't stuffed your cheeks yet!
translation.ja: 口をつぐめばほっぺに入るよ

translation.en: Yes! That sounds very good.
translation.ja: よし　ちゃんと詰め込んだね

translation.en: Jeanette!
ALVIN: Dave!
They're supposed to be behind that waterfall!
translation.ja: あの滝の後ろにいるはずだ

translation.en: That's right. That's what I'm talking about. (MUFFLED SPEECH)
translation.ja: これよ　これを待ってたの

translation.en: ALVIN: Zoe!
No, no. Not another step.
Don't come any closer.
Are you all right, Jeanette?
I'm pretty freaked out,
and those earrings tasted awful.
translation.ja: この耳飾り ひどい味

translation.en: Zoe, you don't have to do this.
translation.ja: ゾーイ　もうやめろ

translation.en: Oh, I don't? I spent 10 years looking for this treasure.
translation.ja: イヤだね 10年もお宝を探してたんだ

translation.en: It's the whole reason why I came to this stinking island!
translation.ja: だから この島に来たんだよ

translation.en: You mean you didn't crash-land?
They said that I was crazy and they said that this map was a fake.
translation.ja: 私は変人扱いだし⸺ 地図も偽物だって言われた

translation.en: And now the treasure is mine! (GROUND RUMBLING)
translation.ja: でも やっと宝を見つけた

translation.en: Run!
Jeanette, come on, come on.
Run!
(SQUEALS) ZOE: No, you don't!
Jeanette!
JEANETTE: Help, help!
Oh, no, help!
You're going back in that cave, and you are going to get me more treasure.
translation.ja: あの洞穴に戻ってもっとお宝を持っておいで

translation.en: Jeanette!
Simone!
It's Simon!
(DISTORTED) Alvin!
DAVE: Come on, guys, go! Hurry!
Go, go!
Look!
Come on!
Run!
But where's Dave?
Help me up!
Oh, help you up?
Is that what I'm supposed to do now, Dave?
All I had was my treasure, and now it's gone.
translation.ja: 私の大切な宝がなくなった

translation.en: Do you get that? My life is ruined.
translation.ja: もう人生 終わりよ

translation.en: And now you're gonna know how that feels.
IAN: It's tempting to blame Dave.
I know. I've been there.
I wish I could get back all those years I spent plotting my revenge. All that time and energy, wasted.
translation.ja: だが復讐(ふくしゅう)に費やした時間と労力はムダだった

translation.en: All those pizzas I had delivered to his house, wasted.
That was you?
Not now, Dave! All right?
You could let Dave fall to his death and I could go back to the raft with the chipmunks,
translation.ja: デイブが死んだら俺が第一線に返り咲いて⸺

translation.en: become their manager again and make tons of money.
translation.ja: デイブが死んだら俺が第一線に返り咲いて⸺ 大もうけできるから本当はどうでもいい

translation.en: So, really, I'm good either way.
translation.ja: 大もうけできるから本当はどうでもいい

translation.en: But let me tell you something.
Hate, anger, regret, those aren't just members of a girl group I once signed.
translation.ja: 憎しみや怒りは言葉だけにしとけ

translation.en: They're what consumed me. And they're consuming you.
It's not too late to do the right thing.
translation.ja: でも今なら まだ助かる

translation.en: Or not. Again,
I'm good either way, so... I don't want to sway you.
translation.ja: どうでもいいから自分で決めて

translation.en: What are you guys doing? Help me.
translation.ja: おい　何やってる？ 助けて

translation.en: Please. Help me save my dad!
